data.comment: In the minute -1, A total of 7920 spectators is reported.
The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in Khimki.
In the minute 2, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Khimki in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Anton Miranchuk gets in a shot on goal at RZD Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 6, Lokomotiv Moscow are coming forward and Grzegorz Krychowiak gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Khimki at RZD Arena.
Throw-in high up the field for Lokomotiv Moscow in Moscow.
In the minute 7, Evgeniy Kukulyak awards Khimki a goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow close to the penalty box.
Egor Danilkin is booked for the away team.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
Khimki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Khimki's Aleksandr Troshechkin breaks free at RZD Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 15, Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
Khimki to take a throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow territory.
Khimki advance rapidly upfield but Evgeniy Kukulyak blows for offside.
In the minute 17, Lokomotiv Moscow are pushing forward but Maciej Rybus's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 20, Anton Miranchuk (Lokomotiv Moscow) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow at RZD Arena.
In the minute 21, Khimki have a goal kick.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards Khimki a goal kick.
Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
In the minute 25, Goal! Lokomotiv Moscow have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Vitali Lisakovich.
Great play from Vedran Corluka to set up the goal.
Ball safe as Lokomotiv Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 27, Evgeniy Kukulyak awards the away team a throw-in.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 29, Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Moscow to check on Dmitrii Zhivoglyadov, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 31, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Dmitrii Zhivoglyadov looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Free kick Khimki.
Evgeniy Kukulyak waits before resuming play because Vedran Corluka for Lokomotiv Moscow is still down.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to Khimki.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a Khimki throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half.
It seems as if Vedran Corluka is unable to continue. Daniil Kulikov replaces him for the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Khimki.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Lokomotiv Moscow drive upfield and Anton Miranchuk gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Khimki defender.
In the minute 40, Khimki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Khimki.
In the minute 44, Can Lokomotiv Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Khimki's half?
Grzegorz Krychowiak for Lokomotiv Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Khimki at RZD Arena.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Khimki are caught offside.
Free kick Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 45, In Moscow, Grzegorz Krychowiak (Lokomotiv Moscow) misses the target with a header.
Evgeniy Kukulyak blows to end the first-half.
Evgeni Gapon (Khimki) gets a yellow card.
Evgeniy Kukulyak has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Kirill Bozhenov is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Ilya Kukharchuk with an assist there.
In the minute 47, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow, close to Khimki's area.
Denis Glushakov is on a sub for Islambek Kuat for Khimki.
Lokomotiv Moscow drives forward and Anton Miranchuk gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 49, Khimki push forward at RZD Arena and Denis Glushakov gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Lokomotiv Moscow defence.
Free kick for Khimki in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
Throw-in Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 51, Can Lokomotiv Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
Eder (Lokomotiv Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Lokomotiv Moscow move into a 2-1 lead through a Vladislav Ignatev header.
In the minute 55, That's a fine assist from Anton Miranchuk.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Khimki.
Free kick Khimki.
In the minute 58, In Moscow Khimki attack through Denis Glushakov. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 59, Lokomotiv Moscow to take a throw-in in Khimki territory.
Anton Miranchuk of Lokomotiv Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Khimki at RZD Arena.
In the minute 61, Ball safe as Lokomotiv Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Important block from the Khimki defence as Grzegorz Krychowiak fires in a strike for Lokomotiv Moscow.
Khimki's Vladimir Dyadyun gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 64, Evgeniy Kukulyak awards Lokomotiv Moscow a goal kick.
The away team replace Danil Lipovoy with Mohamed Konate.
In the minute 65, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a Khimki throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half.
Reziuan Mirzov is replacing Ilya Kukharchuk for the away team.
Lokomotiv Moscow needs to be cautious. Khimki have an attacking throw-in.
Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Khimki close to the penalty box.
At RZD Arena, Lokomotiv Moscow are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 69, Can Khimki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, Lokomotiv Moscow's Anton Miranchuk gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Khimki defender.
Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
In Moscow, Murilo Cerqueira (Lokomotiv Moscow) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 72, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Khimki.
Khimki's Brian Idowu misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 74, Ball goes out of play for a Lokomotiv Moscow goal kick.
Vladimir Dyadyun for Khimki drives towards goal at RZD Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Khimki's Brian Idowu breaks free at RZD Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 76, It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for Khimki at RZD Arena.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Khimki.
Ball goes out of play for a Lokomotiv Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
The home team have replaced Vitali Lisakovich with Rifat Zhemaletdinov. This is the second substitution made today by Marko Nikolic.
Throw-in for Khimki in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 82, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards the home team a throw-in.
In Moscow Lokomotiv Moscow drive forward through Daniil Kulikov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 86, Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
Murilo Cerqueira (Lokomotiv Moscow) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards Khimki a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Khimki push upfield but Evgeniy Kukulyak quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Khimki.
In the minute 87, Lokomotiv Moscow to take a throw-in in Khimki territory.
Khimki make their fourth substitution with Kamran Aliev replacing Vladimir Dyadyun.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a Khimki throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half.
Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
Can Lokomotiv Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
Khimki needs to be cautious. Lokomotiv Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Dmitry Rybchinskiy is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Throw-in for Khimki at RZD Arena.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
Marko Nikolic is making the team's third substitution at RZD Arena with Dmitry Rybchinskiy replacing Anton Miranchuk.
Dmitri Tikhiy (Khimki) has received a first yellow card.
Denis Glushakov (Khimki) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
